bioconda.name: bioconductor-doppelgangr
bioconda.summary: Identify likely duplicate samples from genomic or meta-data

biotools.summary: Its main function takes as minimal input a list of ExpressionSet object, and searches all list pairs for duplicated samples. The search is based on the genomic data, phenotype/clinical data, and "smoking guns" - supposedly unique identifiers found in pData(eset).

bioschemas.name: doppelgangR
bioschemas.summary: Its main function takes as minimal input a list of ExpressionSet object, and searches all list pairs for duplicated samples. The search is based on the genomic data, phenotype/clinical data, and "smoking guns" - supposedly unique identifiers found in pData(eset).
